message.body: I already took care of it but now there is definitely no eating in the basement. Food goes in the freezer. Plus shadow almost ate it bec he smelled It and that would have made him sick afterwards.

And when you get home you can clean your bucket bec something spilled in it. So not only was there mozx sticks and sauce, there was pbj wrapper and nutter butter wrapper and w whatever that liquid is! You can rinse it in the tub
Plus you now have until monday to clean your room. Steph told you a month ago to do it. You have our blankets all over the floor. I want it straightened up
